Ask Your Father Anything (or yell at him)
So many of us have trouble talking to our fathers. I did too. A lot. 
So, I want to gift you the opportunity to have that talk, or just to tell them to fuck off.
https://tinyurl.com/askyourdadanything or text/Whatsapp +45 51 90 31 49 to book a time.

event_description:
This is a place of silence. To come, to meditate, to rejuvenate, to contemplate, to realign, to pray, to be, to just exist, to cry out for God (in silence).
There is power and meaning in doing it together in a dedicated communal space. This is a a lighthouse, an attractor for that.
